title: STF arrests man for illegal explosives possession
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 39-year-old resident of Trincomalee was arrested by STF officers for illegally possessing a stock of explosives on Sunday (20).
The STF team has arrested this person near Vijitha Stores in the Kuchchaveli Police Division.
A 39-year-old resident of Trincomalee was arrested and handed over to the Kuchchaveli Police for further investigations.
CA orders Lands Commissioner NOT to follow circular on ‘Other State Forests’
